articles.title: Korean people's struggle supported abroad
Reception at Russian consulate general
articles.content:
Korean people's struggle supported abroad 
    Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- Korea should be independently reunified by the concerted efforts of the Korean people, who are responsible for national reunification, without any foreign forces' interference. We will extend positive support to the Korean people's struggle for national reunification and make active efforts to further develop the relations with the Workers' Party of Korea.
 The national chairman of the Brazilian Communist Party, the General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Paraguay, the General Secretary of the Central Committee of the Communist Party of Peru (Red Motherland) and the national leader of the Communist Party of Canada (Marxist-Leninist) said this when meeting with the DPRK ambassador to Peru who is the delegate of the WPK to the 10th Congress of the Brazilian Communist Party from Dec. 9 to 12.    
 They stressed that the army-centered policy pursued by leader Kim Jong Il is the most just political mode meeting the requirements of the current international situation and herein lies the secret of the successes made by the DPRK in firmly defending and glorifying socialism.

articles.title: Floral basket to Kim Jong Il from military attaches corps
Army-based policy of WPK studied and disseminated abroad
articles.content:
Floral basket to Kim Jong Il from military attaches corps 
    Pyongyang, December 29 (KCNA) -- The military attaches corps here presented a floral basket and congratulatory letter to Kim Jong Il, supreme commander of the Korean People's Army, on the occasion of the New Year Juche 91 (2002).
 The floral basket and congratulatory letter were handed to an official concerned by military attache of the Chinese embassy here Yan Jiangfeng, who is the doyen of the corps, on Dec. 28.    
 And congratulatory letters and gifts from the Cuban, Vietnamese and Iranian military attaches were conveyed to an official concerned.
